general.serviceName: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK One Login

phaseBanner.text: This is a new service – your feedback (opens in new tab) will help us to improve it.

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on GOV.UK One Login
cookieBanner.heading: Cookies on GOV.UK One Login
cookieBanner.paragraph1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookieBanner.paragraph2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

cookeBannerAccept.paragraph1: You’ve accepted additional cookies. You can

cookeBannerReject.paragraph1: You’ve rejected additional cookies. You can

cookie.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler.

contentLicence.linkText: All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated

content.paragraph1: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
content.paragraph2: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.

error500.title: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
error500.header: Sorry, there is a problem with the service

content.listItem1: have not used your GOV.UK One Login for more than 2 hours
content.listItem2: signed out of your GOV.UK One Login while using another service
content.paragraph2: We signed you out to keep your GOV.UK One Login and your information secure.
content.signInButtonText: Sign in to GOV.UK One Login

mfaSection.heading: How you get security codes
mfaSection.paragraph: We use security codes to make sure it’s you when you sign in.

upsell.heading: Your back-up method
upsell.paragraph: We recommend you add one more way to get security codes. This can be another phone number or an authenticator app.
upsell.paragraph2: This will make sure you can always sign in, even if you cannot get security codes your usual way.

manageEmailSubscriptions.heading: GOV.UK email subscriptions
manageEmailSubscriptions.info: See and manage the emails you get about updates to pages on GOV.UK.

deleteAccount.heading: Delete your GOV.UK One Login
deleteAccount.info: This will permanently delete your GOV.UK One Login. You’ll no longer be able to access the services you’ve used with it.

activityHistory.heading: Activity history
activityHistory.info: See what you’ve visited with your GOV.UK One Login and when.

confirmAddMfaMethod.heading: You've added another way to get security codes
confirmAddMfaMethod.message: If your usual way to get security codes is not available, you can get a code from this authenticator app instead

addMfaMethod.title: Add another way to get security codes

sms.title: Backup phone number
sms.hint: Get a text message to a different mobile phone

app.title: Authenticator app for smartphone, tablet or computer

help.title: What is an authenticator app?
help.text1: An authenticator app creates a security code that helps confirm it's you when you sign in.
help.text2: You can use an authenticator app on your smartphone, tablet or desktop computer. Download an authenticator app for your smartphone or tablet from your app store or search online for an authenticator app for your computer.

addMfaMethod.backLink: I do not want to add another way to get security codes

step1.text: 1. Open your authenticator app on your smartphone, tablet, or computer.
step1.hintTitle: I don't have an authenticator app
step1.hintText:
You can download an authenticator app for your smartphone or tablet from your app store.

If you don't have a smartphone or tablet, search online for an authenticator app for your computer.

You can use any authenticator app.

step2.text: 2. Use your authenticator app to scan the QR code.
step2.hintTitle: I cannot scan the QR code
step2.hintText:
You can enter the secret key into your authenticator app manually.

Secret Key:
[secretKey]

Some authenticator apps call the secret key a 'code'.

step3.text: 3. The authenticator app will show a security code.

step4.label: Security code
step4.hint: This is the 6-digit code shown in your authenticator app

activityHistory.title: Activity history
activityHistory.explanation: See what you’ve visited with your GOV.UK One Login and when.
activityHistory.empty: There is a problem showing your activity history at the moment. You can try again later or contact the GOV.UK One Login team.
activityHistory.notice: If you see something you do not recognise, report it and change your password.
activityHistory.featureIntro: GOV.UK One Login started recording activity history on 12 March 2024.

reportSuspiciousActivity.title: Report activity you do not recognise
reportSuspiciousActivity.header: Report activity you do not recognise
reportSuspiciousActivity.paragraph1: If you do not recognise this activity, report it to the GOV.UK One Login team.
reportSuspiciousActivity.paragraph2: A confirmation email with your report number will be sent to [email].

success.title: You’ve reported activity you do not recognise
success.header: You’ve reported activity you do not recognise
success.paragraph: Thanks for reporting this activity. A confirmation email with your report number has been sent to [email].

section1.heading: Change your password
section1.paragraph1: Change your password if you have not done this already.
section1.paragraph2: Changing your password is the best way to keep your GOV.UK One Login secure.
section1.listItem1: create a secure and memorable password, for example by using 3 random words
section1.listItem2: use a different password to the one you use to sign in to your email

section2.heading: What happens next
section2.paragraph1: The GOV.UK One Login team will investigate your report.
section2.paragraph2: We’ll only email you again if you need to do something to help protect your GOV.UK One Login.
section2.paragraph3: We’ll always include your report number when we email you.

section3.heading: If you need to contact us
section3.paragraph1: You can contact the GOV.UK One Login team (opens in a new tab).
section3.paragraph2: You’ll need to quote your report number when you contact us. You can find it in the confirmation email we’ve just sent you.

alreadyReported.title: You’ve already reported this activity
alreadyReported.noReportNo: You'll get a confirmation email with your report number.

contact.heading: If you need to contact us
contact.paragraph1: You can contact the GOV.UK One Login team (opens in a new tab).
contact.paragraph2: You’ll need to quote your report number when you contact us.

yourServices.title: Your services
yourServices.empty: You’re not using any services with your GOV.UK One Login yet.

informationBox.heading: Services you can use with GOV.UK One Login
informationBox.paragraph1: GOV.UK One Login is new. At the moment you can only use it to access some government services.

details.summary: Services you can use with GOV.UK One Login
details.paragraph: You can use GOV.UK One Login with:

listItems.text: Apply for a vehicle operator licence
Apply for an HM Armed Forces Veteran Card
Apply to become a registered social worker in England
Find a UK market conformity assessment body
Find and apply for a grant
Manage family support services and accounts

informationBox.paragraph2: GOV.UK One Login does not work with all government accounts and services yet (for example Government Gateway or Universal Credit).
informationBox.paragraph3: In the future, you'll be able to use GOV.UK One Login to access all services on GOV.UK.

changeEmail.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can change your email address.
changeEmail.backLink: I do not want to change my email address

changePassword.title: Enter your current password
changePassword.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can change your password.
changePassword.backLink: I do not want to change my password

changePhoneNumber.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can change your phone number.
changePhoneNumber.backLink: I do not want to change my phone number

deleteAccount.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can delete your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.backLink: I do not want to delete my GOV.UK One Login

addMfaMethod.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can manage how you get your security codes

validationError.length: Email address must be 256 characters or fewer
validationError.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
validationError.alreadyInUse: There’s already a GOV.UK One Login using that email address. Enter a different email address.
validationError.sameEmail: You are already using that email address. Enter a different email address.

dontWantTo.changeEmailLinkText: I do not want to change my email address

updateEmailConfirmation.title: You’ve changed your email address
updateEmailConfirmation.summaryText: Your email address has been changed to [email]

updatePhoneNumberConfirmation.title: You’ve changed your phone number
updatePhoneNumberConfirmation.summaryText: Your phone number has been changed to [mobile].

deleteAccountConfirmation.title: You’ve deleted your GOV.UK One Login
deleteAccountConfirmation.panelText: You’ve deleted your GOV.UK One Login
deleteAccountConfirmation.summaryText: If you need to use a GOV.UK One Login in the future, you’ll have to create a new one.

changePassword.title: Enter your new password

password.hint: Your password must be at least 8 characters and must include letters and numbers. Do not use a very common password, such as ‘password’ or a sequence of numbers.
password.label: Enter a new password

validationError.maxLength: Your password must be less than 256 characters
validationError.commonPassword: Enter a stronger password. Do not use very common passwords, such as ‘password’ or a sequence of numbers.
validationError.samePassword: You are already using that password. Enter a different password.
validationError.alphaNumeric: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and must include letters and numbers

validationError.matches: Enter the same password in both fields

securePasswordDetails.summary: How to create a secure password
securePasswordDetails.text: A good way to create a secure and memorable password is to use 3 random words. You can use numbers, symbols and spaces.

changePassword.backLink: I do not want to change my password

checkYourEmail.title: Check your email
checkYourEmail.text: We have sent an email to:

info.paragraph1: The email contains a 6 digit security code.
info.paragraph2: Your email might take a few minutes to arrive. If you do not get an email, check your spam folder.
info.paragraph3: The code will expire after 15 minutes.

validationError.maxLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.minLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidFormat: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidCode: The security code you entered is not correct, or may have expired, try entering it again or request a new security code.

checkYourPhone.title: Check your phone
checkYourPhone.text: We have sent a code to [mobile].

info.paragraph: It might take a few minutes to arrive. The code will expire after  15 minutes.

details.text: We can send the code again or you can use a different phone number.

validationError.maxLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.minLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidFormat: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidCode: The security code you entered is not correct, or may have expired, try entering it again or request a new security code.

deleteAccount.title: Are you sure you want to delete your GOV.UK One Login?
deleteAccount.header: Are you sure you want to delete your GOV.UK One Login?
deleteAccount.paragraph1: This will permanently delete the sign in details for your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.paragraph2: You will no longer be able to use your GOV.UK One Login to access:
deleteAccount.paragraph3: This will also delete your GOV.UK email subscriptions.
deleteAccount.paragraph4a: It will not delete the personal information held by services you’ve used with your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.paragraph4b: It will not delete the personal information held by services you’ve used.
deleteAccount.paragraph5: If you need a GOV.UK One Login in the future, you’ll have to create a new one.
deleteAccount.details: Deleting your GOV.UK One Login will not affect any other government accounts you may have, such as Government Gateway or Universal Credit.
deleteAccount.doNotDeleteAccount: Cancel and go back to security

changePhoneNumber.title: Enter your new mobile phone number
changePhoneNumber.header: Enter your new mobile phone number

info.paragraph1: We will send a 6 digit security code to the number you give us.
info.backLink: I do not want to change my phone number

validationError.required: Enter a UK mobile phone number
validationError.international: Enter a UK mobile phone number
validationError.length: Enter a UK mobile phone number, like 07700 900000
validationError.plusNumericOnly: Enter a UK mobile phone number using only numbers or the + symbol
validationError.samePhoneNumber: You’re already using that phone number. Enter a different phone number.

internationalPhoneNumber.checkBoxLabel: I do not have a UK mobile number
internationalPhoneNumber.label: Mobile phone number
internationalPhoneNumber.hint: Include the country code, for example +33 for France

validationError.plusNumericOnly: Enter a mobile phone number using only numbers or the + symbol
validationError.internationalFormat: Enter a mobile phone number in the correct format, including the country code

signedOut.title: You have signed out
signedOut.signInLinkText: sign in to your GOV.UK One Login

resendMfaCode.title: Get security code
resendMfaCode.message: Text messages can sometimes take a few minutes to arrive.

phoneNumber.insetText: We will send a code to [mobile]
phoneNumber.paragraph: Text messages can sometimes take a few minutes to arrive.

email.recipientMessage: We will send a code to:
email.paragraph: Your email might take a few minutes to arrive. If you do not get an email, check your spam folder.

contact.title: Contact GOV.UK One Login
contact.metaDescription: Contact us for help using your GOV.UK One Login including problems signing in, proving your identity or managing your details. Call or talk to us online.

section1.heading: Before you contact us
paragraphs: Read our guidance if you're having a problem with:

links.text: Using the GOV.UK ID Check app
Proving your identity with GOV.UK One Login by answering security questions
Changing the sign in details for your GOV.UK One Login
Getting a security code for GOV.UK One Login

paragraphsWebchat: If you contact us by phone or use webchat, you'll be asked for a reference code.
This code helps us to see where you may be having a problem.
paragraphsNoWebchat: When you contact us by phone, you’ll be asked for a reference code.
This code helps us to see where you may be having a problem.

webchat.heading: Webchat
paragraphs: Ask GOV.UK One Login's digital assistant to find information to help you or chat with an advisor.
Our webchat is not yet fully accessible. Find out more about the limitations and how we're working to fix this.

Opening times:
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Weekends and public holidays, 9am to 5.30pm

phone.heading: Phone
paragraphs: You'll need your reference code when you call.
paragraphs2:
Opening times:
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Weekends and public holidays, 9am to 5.30pm
Find out about call charges
phone.waitingTimeWarning: There are currently long waiting times on the phone. If your call is not urgent, try again later or fill in the contact form.

email.heading: Email
paragraphs: Fill in the contact form to ask for help.
We’ll reply by email within 2 days.

Opening times:
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Weekends and public holidays, 9am to 5.30pm

section4.heading: How we use your information
paragraphs: To find out what information we store when you contact us and how we use it, see the GOV.UK One Login privacy notice.

connectFamilies.description: Find local support services for children, young people, parents and carers.

hmrc.header: A service run by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC)
hmrc.hint_text: For example services about tax, childcare, or state pensions.
hmrc.paragraph1: At the moment, GOV.UK One Login cannot show you which HMRC service you’ve used.
hmrc.paragraph2: We’re working to make this possible.
